    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Entwässerung der Tagbaue</string>
            <string language="en">Drainage of opencast mines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Drainage des mines à ciel ouvert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Drenagem de minas opencast</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Drenaggio delle miniere a cielo aperto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποξήρανση των υπαίθριων ορυχείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Drenaje de minas a cielo abierto</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Schema der Entwässerungssystematik und Schematik der Stützung von Feuchtgebieten zur Erhaltung von Bächen und Feuchtgebieten im Tagebau. Zwei Schaubilder der RWE.</string>
            <string language="en">Model of drainage system and schematic of wetland support regarding the preservation of creeks and wetlands at opencast mines. Two illustrations by the RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tagebau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Braunkohle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Rheinland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Open mining</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Brown coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rhine country</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de canalisation et de schéma du support 
de marécage concernant la conservation des criques et des 
marécages aux mines à ciel ouvert. Deux illustrations par le 
RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo do sistema de drenagem e do diagrama 
esquemático da sustentação do wetland a respeito da preservação 
dos creeks e dos wetlands em minas opencast. Duas ilustrações 
pelo RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello della rete di fognatura e dello schema 
del supporto del wetland per quanto riguarda la conservazione delle 
insenature e dei wetlands alle miniere a cielo aperto. Due 
illustrazioni dal RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο του συστήματος αποξηράνσεων και σχηματική 
αναπαράσταση της υποστήριξης υγρότοπου σχετικά με τη συντήρηση 
των κολπίσκων και των υγρότοπων στα υπαίθρια ορυχεία. Δύο 
απεικονίσεις από το RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del alcantarillado y del diagrama 
esquemático de la ayuda del wetland con respecto a la preservación 
de cala y de wetlands en las minas a cielo abierto. Dos 
ilustraciones por el RWE.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exploitation ouverte</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lignite</string>
          </keyword>
